thread.title: BRIEF-Points International Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.08

title: BRIEF-Points International Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.08
text: March 8, 2018 / 9:24 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Points International Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.08 Reuters Staff March 8 (Reuters) - Points International Ltd: * REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND RECORD FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE $87.7 MILLION VERSUS $82 MILLION * 2018 ‍GROSS PROFIT IS EXPECTED TO INCREASE BETWEEN 10% AND 20% OVER 2017 ​ * 2018 ‍ADJUSTED EBITDA IS EXPECTED TO INCREASE BETWEEN 20% AND 40% OVER 2017 * ‍MICHAEL D’AMICO, CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER WILL BE RETIRING FROM HIS POSITION​ * ‍ERICK GEORGIOU TAKES OVER AS CFO, EFFECTIVE APRIL 2, 2018​ * ‍D’AMICO WILL REMAIN WITH COMPANY THROUGH END OF YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
